name: Galaxis (Arcade Shoot'em Up)
description:
What is Galaxis?

Galaxis is a small shoot'em up arcade game made for a game jam/student project. (CONTROLLER SUPPORT)

CONTROLS

W A S D Move Mouse 1Primary FireMouse 2Secondary Fire

Gamepad Control

Left StickLeft/RightRight StickUp/DownLeft TriggerPrimary FireRight TriggerSecondary Fire

CREDITS

@KryptonProxy - Programming, AI, UI, Maps, & Textures

Some sounds from freesound.org

Ship models & space material from UE4 content examples

Royalty-free background music is from here.
